text: Game Freak, Inc. is a Japanese video game company that makes video games for Nintendo game consoles. It is most well known for developing the Pok√©mon series of role-playing video games. Game Freak was originally a gaming magazine created by Satoshi Tajiri and Ken Sugimori in the 1980s. On April 26, 1989, Tajiri and Sugimori started a video game company with the same name. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Game Freak website Category:1989 establishments in Japan Category:Video game companies of Japan
title: Game Freak
